title: Fedora Workstation 41 will drop GNOME X.Org session as fallback option
description: While defaulting to Wayland since version 25 of Fedora Workstation (GNOME), and Fedora version 34 for the KDE Plasma Desktop spin, this Linux distribution intends to completely ditch X.Org session as fallback for GNOME on release 41.

title: Squad-based shooter Enlisted: Reinforced from Gaijin is coming to Steam
description: Enlisted: Reinforced is a World War II squad-based shooter from War Thunder publisher Gaijin, and it was recently revealed to be finally coming to Steam.

title: KeeperRL 1.0 is out now, merging Dungeon Keeper and a little Dwarf Fortress
description: Something around 11 years later, KeeperRL 1.0 has officially been released! A good choice perhaps for people who find Dwarf Fortress a little too much, and enjoy dungeon building.

title: Nintendo DS emulator DraStic became free of charge after Yuzu case
description: After Yuzu emulator owners agreed to pay Nintendo $2.4 million USD and EmuDeck also announcing Yuzu and Citra removal right after the court settlement became available on the internet, Nintendo DS emulator DraStic is now free.

title: FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage updated with Steam Deck support and no more DRM
description: Now known as FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage Collector's Edition, this classic racer has received a fresh big upgrade to ensure it runs nicely and is now Steam Deck Verified.

title: Plasma 6 lands in Arch Linux, KDE neon teething issues and Plasma 6.1 heating up
description: The dust is beginning to settle now the huge KDE Plasma 6 release is out in the wild, with it beginning to land for more distributions but there's been some issues.

title: OpenRCT2 for RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 adds Ukrainian language, partial underground building
description: OpenRCT2 continues to keep the dream of RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 alive, with a new release v0.4.9 now available adding in some new features and plenty of bug fixes.

title: Horizon Forbidden West system requirements up, devs mention 'portable gaming devices'
description: Horizon Forbidden West Complete Edition lands on PC soon on March 21st, with Nixxes once again handling the porting of this previously PlayStation exclusive. The system requirements are also now up so we can see what to expect.

title: Ghost of Tsushima comes to PC on May 16
description: Another PlayStation exclusive is heading to PC! Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT has been announced with a May 16th release date.
